metadata.synopsis: An one-shot AD where manip Nestor and his subordinate flaming fists Madigan discuss what are we doing in the barn with him. Manip explains that we reported that there was something dangerous among the donations and we were allowed to take a look together with him.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Refugee Camp, Big BarnPersuade Nestor to let you in to investigate the donations, and follow him (you can persuade him if you've visited the toymaker's basement, or use: oe WYR_MerchantsHouse_KnowsBasement).

3.speaker: Fist Madigan
3.text: Is everything all right, Manip Nestor? Sir?

2.speaker: Manip Nestor
2.text: There's been a report of dangerous contraband in the donations, and we're going to check it out.

0.speaker: Fist Madigan
0.text: Why? All these goods have already been checked in.

1.speaker: Manip Nestor
1.text: I didn't ask for your opinion, Fist. Fall in and do your job.
